cleaned_text: Essential Oil Therapies [Couple's Romantic Spa Therapies](https://yihanspa.com/services/essential-oil-therapies-926/) Essential oils, or aromatherapy oils, are the aromatic essence of plants. Aromatherapy is a method of using natural oils extracted from flowers, bark, stems, leaves, roots, or other plants to enhance mental and physical health. Important oil benefits come from their antioxidants, antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties. These healing oils are natural medicines with no side effects. Use high-quality essential oils to replenish your skin and spirit. The massage deeply penetrates the tissue, and the custom scent sends your body and mind to a clear and relaxed place. A unique mixture of essential oils can soothe your nervous system and soothe your heart. This technique can energize your body and make you feel energized. Please remember, your essential oil treatment can only be included with other Yihan Spa services. Essential oil treatments are not offered separately. When you book a Spa Treatment, let the Receptionist know which essential oil treatment you want or have her suggest one for you and she will add it to your service. If you are booking online, separately book the essential oil treatment you want and it will be added to your service. Essential oils can be added to any Yihan Spa treatment for $40.00.
